quote:
Change your thoughts
 and
 you change your world.

Three things in life :
your health
your mission
and the people you love.
That’s it.

Those who realize their folly
 are not true fools.

Keep your eyes on the stars
and your feet on the ground.

It’s better 
to be a lion for a day
than a sheep all your life.

Life is a question 
and how we live it
 is our answer.

Keep looking up…
that’s the secret of life.

It always seems impossible 
until it’s done.

Life is too important
to be taken seriously.

Life is 
like a box of chocolates.
You never know 
what you’re going to get.
Life isn’t a matter of milestones,  but of moments.

Not how long,
but how well 
you have lived is the main thing.

I love those who
 can smile in trouble.

Be happy
 for this moment.
This moment is your life.

Life is what happens
when you’re busy 
making other plans.

Very little is needed
 to make a happy life.

You’ve gotta dance
like there’s nobody watching.

Believe 
that life is worth living
 and your belief will help
 create the fact.

Don't take life 
too seriously.
You will never get out of it alive.

Don’t search
for the meaning of life.
Simply be present 
for the people you love.

The trick in life is
 learning how to deal with it.

Get busy living 
or
 get busy dying.

Don’t cry 
because it’s over.
Smile
 because it happened.

Life is either 
a daring adventure or nothing at all.
Keep calm and carry on.

Love all,
trust a few,
do wrong to none.

Life is ours to be spent,
 not to be saved.

The greatest pleasure
 of life is love.

Life can be simple and beautiful.
Focus on the good things.

Life is a long lesson 
in humility.

It’s better to dance
 than to march
 through life.

We are who 
we choose to be.

The only impossible journey
 is the one you never begin.
Your best life will not be found in comfort.

Doing is a quantum leap
 from imagining.
Be so good they can’t ignore you.

If you don’t like something
 change it.

All our dreams can come true 
if we have the courage
 to pursue them.

The dreamers are the saviors
 of the world.

Life is to entered
 upon with courage.
Life is a single player game.

Life is the art
of drawing sufficient conclusions
from insufficient premises.

Life is a process.
We are a process.
The universe is a process.

Life is beautiful
because it doesn’t last.

Reverence for life
is the highest court of appeal.

The tragedy of life
is what dies inside a man
while he lives.

Life is wide, limitless.
There is no border, no frontier.

Life is about learning.
When you stop learning,
you die.

Life is not an exact science, 
it is an art.

Love is a better teacher
than duty.

Life is a series
 of baby steps.

Love yourself first 
and everything else 
falls into line.

Don't give it five minutes
if you're not going to
 give it five years.

I've failed over and over
and that is why I succeed.

Nothing can dim the light 
that shines from within.

Sometimes you will never know
 the value of a moment
 until it becomes a memory.

Only I can change my life.
No one can do it for me.

If everything was perfect,
you would never learn
 and you would never grow.

Life is like riding a bicycle.
To keep your balance,
you must keep moving.

Life isn't about finding yourself.
Life is about creating yourself.

It is not the length of life,
but depth of life.

Where there is no struggle,
there is no strength.

Above all,
be the heroine of your life,
not the victim.

It's not whether you get knocked down.
It's whether you get up.

Remember,
no one can make you feel inferior
 without your consent.

Yesterday is not ours to recover,
but tomorrow is ours to win or lose.

Knowing what must be done
 does away with fear.

Your time is limited,
so don't waste it 
living someone else's life.

Innovation distinguishes 
between a leader and a follower.

I want to put a ding
in the universe.

Sometimes life is going to hit you 
in the head with a brick.
Don't lose faith.

Things don't have to change the world
 to be important.

I'm as proud of
 what we don't do
as I am of what we do.

Life is not fair;
get used to it.

Your most unhappy customers
are your greatest source of learning.

If you can't make it good,
at least make it look good.

If you think your teacher is tough,
wait until you get a boss.
He doesn't have tenure.

It's fine to celebrate success
but it is more important
to heed the lessons of failure.

Success is a lousy teacher.
It seduces smart people
into thinking they can't lose.

I could either watch it happen
 or be a part of it.

The first step is to establish that something is possible;
then probability will occur.

Failure is an option here.
If things are not failing,
you are not innovating enough.

Persistence is very important.
You should not give up
unless you are forced to give up.
